item.title: Virtual Lab Build
item.description: Lab parts list note: I decided to build 2 nodes for personal reasons, a single node (half all parts) will be perfectly fine to use. 2x ATX case - https://www.newegg.com/black-corsair-icue-220t-rgb-airflow-atx-mid-tower/p/N82E16811139142?Item=N82E16811139142 8x 64GB LR Ram - https://www.newegg.com/p/1X5-003Z-018J5?Item=9SIA7S6B0B3748 2x 2Tb M.2 - https://www.newegg.com/crucial-2tb-p2/p/N82E16820156274?Item=N82E16820156274 2x Motherboard/CPU combo - https://www.newegg.com/supermicro-mbd-h11ssl-i302p-ma015-o-single-amd-epyc-7000-series-processor/p/N82E16813183698?Item=N82E16813183698 2x PSU - https://www.newegg.com/corsair-rmx-series-rm1000x-1000w/p/N82E16817139140?Item=N82E16817139140 2x CPU Cooler - https://www.newegg.com/noctua-nh-u12s-tr4-sp3-premium-grade-120mm-cpu-cooler-for-amd-tr4-sp3/p/13C-0005-00141?Item=9SIAADY63N0333 ######not required: 2x 2 NIC AOC - https://www.newegg.com/p/14U-0032-000D1?Item=9SIACTND7R2549 (needed if using VDS in VCenter) 4x 2Tb NAS Drives - https://www.
